title: Welcome to Udaan 18
text: Important information will be served here

title: UDAAN Buzz
text: Team BVM interacts with BVMites and finds out their views on certain aspects for Udaan.

title: UDAAN Days
text: Showcase your strength by showing how unique your group can be! Celebrate group day with us by clicking selfies and photos. Venue: Front Lawn. Time: 4-6 pm.

title: UDAAN Expert talk
text: Team Udaan gives you all opportunity to know and be part of this revolution by organising a seminar on 'Blockchain and Cryptocurrency'. Venue: BVM Auditorium. Date: 27 March. Time: 6pm onwards.
